alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 1:59PM MDT until September 10 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Natrona County in central Wyoming... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Midwest, which is also 17 miles southeast of Kaycee, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Midwest and Edgerton. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 213 and 234. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
